author: Amazon Customer

review: The Fire TV Stick has exceeded all expectations. The value, ease of use, and quality are all top notch. For years, I had been messing with items such as the MK802(insert generation here). They were awesome while they worked, but the poor quality control on those products meant many hours bridging connections and flashing its firmware to restore usability. Not the case with the Fire TV. Out the box, there's an extremely long intro that does nothing for me, and I couldn't skip it... But, I can see the value in the not-so-quick crash course for some first time users. Out the box, there are several free and subscription base apps available for streaming pleasure. This device is a must have for anyone with an Amazon Prime account. For those that do not, fear not, the free apps have plenty to offer. If those are not satisfying enough, there is a huge following on sideloading applications to this device. The quality control appears to be great, though one of our remotes were fritzy out the box.Overall, I've recommended this to family and friends. I also gave some away as gifts and the recipients were pleased with their gifts as well.
author: J. Lee

review: Very intuitive. Set up could not have been easier, and user interface is very fast. I had a Sony bluray player with apps I was using to stream amazon media and was having a miserable experience. It would stall, or stop, not advance fast or took too long to load. The fire stick in comparison is lightening fast and will allow me to stream content in a useable and functional platform. I'm very excited about this product and the service.
